turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what would you like to do today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I want to order a coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which coffee shop would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok double shot expresso from starbucks got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which store you would like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry do you want starbucks or peets coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok which starbucks you want to order from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: store in colorado srpings got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: drink has been ordered at the local store and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.
